Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

block.p: Most first-season top sellers are fairly recent shows. The first season of ''The Odd Couple'' is being released tomorrow. The ultimate buddy comedy starred Tony Randall (above, left, in a scene from 1972) and Jack Klugman as mismatched roommates.

''The Odd Couple'' had a five-year run starting in 1970, and many more in syndication. It has attained classic sitcom status, in spite of its one-joke premise, alongside more socially nuanced hits like ''All in the Family'' (on the air from 1971-79) and ''M*A*S*H'' (1972-83).

Most first-season top sellers are fairly recent shows. The first season of ''The Odd Couple'' is being released tomorrow. The ultimate buddy comedy starred Tony Randall (above, left, in a scene from 1972) and Jack Klugman as mismatched roommates.

''The Odd Couple'' had a five-year run starting in 1970, and many more in syndication. It has attained classic sitcom status, in spite of its one-joke premise, alongside more socially nuanced hits like ''All in the Family'' (on the air from 1971-79) and ''M*A*S*H'' (1972-83).
